gurmukhi: b`ij b`ij s`bj bwjn B`ij B`ij heyNdR ]
transliteration: Bajj(i) Bajj(i) Sabbaj Baajan Bhajj(i) Bhajj(i) Haendra||
translation: The horse-riding warriors are speedily moving with the sounds of various types of musical instruments.

gurmukhi: mwr mwr pukwr kY hQIAwr hwQ sMBwr ]
transliteration: Maar Maar Poukaar Kai Hathooaar Haath Sanbhaar||
translation: Holding their weapons in their hands, the heroes are shouting “kill, kill”.

gurmukhi: Dwie Dwie pry inswcr bwie sMK Apwr ]8]72]
transliteration: Dhaae Dhaae Dare Nisaachar Bade Sankh Apaar||8||72||
translation: Blowing many conches, the demons are running in the battlefield.8.72.

gurmukhi: sMK goXmM g`ijXM Ar s`ijXM irp rwj ]
transliteration: Sankh Goyamannd Gadjiyan Ar Sajjiyan Rip Raaj||
translation: The conches and horns are being blown loudly and the generals of the enemy are ready for war.

gurmukhi: Bwij Bwij cly ikqy qj lwj bIr niRlwj ]
transliteration: Bhaaj(i) Bhaaj(i) Chale Kite Taj Laaj Boor Nrilaaj||
translation: Somewhere the cowards, forsaking their shame, are running away.

gurmukhi: BIm ByrI BUMkIAM Aru DuMkIAM su inswx ]
transliteration: Bhoom Bheroo Bhounkooan Ar(u) Dhounkooan Su Nisaan||
translation: The sound of large-sized drums is being heard and the flags are fluttering.

gurmukhi: gwih gwih iPry Pv`jn bwih bwih gdwx ]9]73]
transliteration: Gadh(i) Gadh(i) Phire Phavajjan Baah(i) Baah(i) Gadaan||9||73||
translation: The forces are roaming and striking their maces.9.73.

gurmukhi: bIr kMgny bMDhIN Aru ACrYN isr qylu ]
transliteration: Boor Kanad Bandh-hoon Ar(u) Achhraoon Sir Tel(u)||
translation: The heavenly maids are bedecking themselves and offering ornaments to the warriors.

gurmukhi: bIin bIin bry brMgn fwir fwir Pulyl ]
transliteration: Boon(i) Boon(i) Bade Baranad Daar(i) Daar(i) Phulel||
translation: Selecting their heroes, the heavenly ladies are being bound with them in wedlock by showrering the oil impregnated with the essence of flowers.

gurmukhi: Gwil Gwil ibvwn ly gI Pyr Pyr su bIr ]
transliteration: Dhaal(i) Dhaal(i) Bivaan Le Goo Pher Pher Su Boor||
translation: They have taken away the warriors with them in their vehicles.

gurmukhi: kUid kUid pry qhwN qy Jwig Jwig su qIr ]10]74]
transliteration: Kood(i) Kood(i) Dare Tahaan Te Jhaag(i) Jhaag(i) Su Toor||10||74||
translation: The heroes inebriated for fighting in thhe war, jump from the vehicles and being shot with arrows, fall down below.10.74

gurmukhi: hwNik hwNik lry qhwN rx rIiJ rIiJ BtyNdR ]
transliteration: Haank(i) Haank(i) Dare Tahaan Ran Roojh(i) Roojh(i) Bhatendra||
translation: Delightfully shouting in the battlefield, the heroic generals have waged war.

gurmukhi: jIiq jIiq lXo ijnHY keI bwr ieMdR aupyNdR ]
transliteration: Jeet(i) Jeet(i) Layo Jinhai Kaoo Baar Indra Oupendra||
translation: Who had several times conquered the king and other chieftains of gods.

gurmukhi: kwit kwit dey kpwlI bwNit bwNit idswn ]
transliteration: Kaattee Kaattee Dae Kapaaloo Baanttee Baanttee Disaan||
translation: Whom Durga (Kapali) chpped and threw in various directions.
